Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'I checked it again in case there was a mistake...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Data shows that most of the functions in the Golden Vortex have stopped running.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: '(Replaces the damaged parts on his gun) Maybe.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Which means Nat has lost the power for the comms interference modules.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "I'm with the Joint Task Force, preparing to back you up. We'll be there to rescue you in a minute!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'The Science Council and I have looked into the report on the Golden Vortex.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'The weather engine they are using is made with parts of a Central Purification Filter from the Post-Pandemic Age.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Meaning that a large amount of Punishing Virus is currently being drawn from the air.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Is that so? Then we should have received warnings the moment we entered the Golden Vortex...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '...Unless the gold dust has suppressed the virus.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "This antigen can't completely remove the virus. It won't be long before there's a massive outbreak here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'For your safety, the Joint Task Force must retreat now.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "When the outbreak happens, Nat's guards... will mostly likely turn into enhanced Corrupted.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Liv, you must get out of here.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: '(Wipes the shattered metal off her blade) ...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'I understand that there are other teams within the Golden Vortex?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "That's right, President. Karenina, Bianca, and Kamui are still here...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "I don't like the idea of leaving the commandant in danger...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'But I hate the idea of leaving my soldiers behind even more.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "I'll come up with a plan of retreat!", 4: '1'}
